nodes.text: Red Nine was the callsign attributed to the ninth member of Red Squadron.
During the Battle of Yavin, a Rebel pilot served as Red Nine until the pilot was killed in action.
Another rebel pilot served as Red Nine during the Hijacking of the Harbinger, the pilot was also killed in action.
After the Battle of Hoth, Penn Zowlie was recruited to serve in Red Squadron and was killed in action fighting off a group of pirates.
